QuestData.Title: Have They No Shame?
QuestData.Description: Archmage Berinand loaned me his research on the Arcanomicron, some sort of map that Malygos is trying to assemble.$B$BI made the mistake of discussing it with a group of Horde adventurers and now it's gone!$b$bIt must have been them. Please, recover the book.
QuestData.LogDescription: Image of Warmage Kaitlyn wants you to recover Berinand's Research.
QuestData.CompletionText: Please, $n, tell me you've found the book...
QuestData.RewardText: You found it!? Yes, yes, it's all here.$b$bPlease, take this with my gratitude.
